item.title: Did you get shares? Mamata Machinery IPO allotment status check online by PAN number - ET Now
item.description:
Mamata Machinery IPO Allotment Status Check: How to Verify Online

Updated: December 25, 2024 | Source: ET Now

The allotment status for the Mamata Machinery IPO, which opened for subscription from December 19 to December 23, 2024, is expected to be announced today.

  • The IPO was 194.95 times subscribed, with bids for 1,00,94,81,802 shares against 51,78,227 shares on offer.
  • Non-Institutional Investors saw a subscription of 274.38 times, Qualified Institutional Buyers had 235.88 times, and Retail Individual Investors were at 138.08 times.
  • The final allotment is expected to be completed today, December 25.
  • Investors can check their allotment status online through Link Intime India, NSE, or BSE.
"The allotment status of Mamata Machinery IPO will be displayed on the screen after entering your details."

In conclusion, investors should verify their allotment status through the designated channels for precise updates.

item.title: From HNIs to retail, why were gold ETFs investors' favourites in 2024? Will their stellar performance continue in 2025? | Stock Market News - Mint
item.description:
Gold ETFs Surge in Popularity Among Investors in 2024

Publication Date: 2024-11-30 Source: Live Mint

In 2024, gold Exchange Traded Funds (ETFs) saw a remarkable increase in demand, quadrupling investments to ‚Çπ1,256 crore from November 2023 to November 2024, as a response to geopolitical uncertainties and market volatility.

Key Points

  • Significant growth in gold ETF investments noted, especially among HNIs and retail investors.
  • Factors influencing demand include geopolitical tensions, inflation, and stock market volatility.
  • Experts expect gold ETFs to remain popular into 2025 as uncertainties continue.
  • Discontinuation of the Sovereign Gold Bond Scheme may redirect investment interest toward gold ETFs.
  • Retail investors‚Äô participation rose 76%, despite still holding a small share of 6% in AUM.
‚ÄúGold ETFs have witnessed a sharp rise in popularity throughout 2024, with AUM growing 64 per cent year-on-year.‚Äù - Mayank Jha

In conclusion, the ongoing global economic conditions are likely to keep gold ETFs attractive for investors in the upcoming year.

item.title: Toyota global production down for 10th month despite rising sales | Company Business News - Mint
item.description:
Toyota Global Production Down for 10th Month Despite Rising Sales

Date: December 25, 2023 Source: Reuters

Toyota Motor's global production decreased for the tenth consecutive month in November, despite an increase in worldwide sales driven by strong demand in the U.S. and China.

  • Toyota manufactured 869,230 vehicles globally in November, down 6.2% year-on-year.
  • U.S. output declined by 11.8%, with a slow recovery noted as production for certain SUV models resumed.
  • China's production fell by 1.6%, an improvement over the previous month‚Äôs 9% decline.
  • Japan witnessed a 9.3% decrease in output, influenced by a two-day halt at some plants.
  • Worldwide sales rose by 1.7% to 920,569 vehicles, setting a record for November.
  • In the January-to-November period, global output was down 5.2% compared to the previous year.
'Toyota has decided to build an independent plant in Shanghai to manufacture electric cars for its Lexus brand starting in 2027.' ‚Äì Nikkei

In conclusion, while Toyota faces production challenges, it continues to achieve record sales in a competitive market, signaling resilience amidst adversity.

item.title: Zerodha's Kamath brothers fund, Groww's parent entity, Share India among 4 to invest in Metropolitan Stock Exchange | Stock Market News - Mint
item.description:
Zerodha‚Äôs Kamath brothers fund, Groww‚Äôs parent entity, Share India among 4 to invest in Metropolitan Stock Exchange

Publication Date: Recent
Source: Livemint

The Metropolitan Stock Exchange of India is set to receive significant investments from major financial players, including Billionbrains Garage Ventures, Rainmatter Investments, Securocorp Securities, and Share India Securities.

  • Metropolitan Stock Exchange approved issuance of up to ‚Çπ238 crores through 119,00,00,000 equity shares.
  • Share India Securities confirmed a strategic investment of ‚Çπ59.50 crores for a 4.958% stake.
  • Comment from Mr. Sachin Gupta, CEO of Share India Securities, on the importance of this investment.
‚ÄúWe are excited to announce our strategic investment of approximately ‚Çπ60 crore in the Metropolitan Stock Exchange of India (MSE), marking a pivotal milestone in our journey to support and shape the future of Indian financial markets.‚Äù - Mr. Sachin Gupta

This development marks a significant expansion strategy for the involved firms and the stock exchange.

item.title: Lyft Accuses San Francisco of $100 Million Tax Overcharge | Company Business News - Mint
item.description:
Lyft Accuses San Francisco of $100 Million Tax Overcharge

Publication Date: N/A

Source: Bloomberg

Lyft Inc. has filed a lawsuit against the city of San Francisco, claiming it has been overcharged $100 million in taxes over five years due to misclassification of driver compensation.

  • Lyft argues that taxes were calculated based on total passenger payments rather than Lyft's revenue model.
  • The company claims this method violates its constitutional rights and misrepresents its financials.
  • The lawsuit highlights ongoing disputes regarding gig economy companies and their classification of workers.
  • Lyft is seeking refunds for overpaid taxes, interest, penalties, and fees.
  • This case follows similar tax disputes with other companies, including Uber.
‚ÄúLyft doesn‚Äôt take operating in San Francisco for granted and we love serving both riders and drivers in our hometown city,‚Äù the company stated.

The outcome of this lawsuit could have implications for how gig economy companies are taxed and classified, potentially affecting future operations in the city.

item.title: Sundar Pichai joins Google‚Äôs ‚Äòugly sweater‚Äô contest on Christmas. His sweater has an India connection - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Sundar Pichai joins Google‚Äôs ‚Äòugly sweater‚Äô contest on Christmas. His sweater has an India connection

Date: Dec 25, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Google hosted an ‚Äòugly sweater‚Äô contest for its employees to ring in the holiday season, with CEO Sundar Pichai participating and showcasing a sweater with an India connection.

  • Sundar Pichai shared photos from the contest on Instagram.
  • The contest was judged by Google‚Äôs AI assistant, Gemini.
  • Pichai‚Äôs sweater featured cricket motifs, reflecting his Indian roots.
  • Social media users praised his choice, linking it to cricket's popularity in India.
‚ÄúCricket sweater awesome sir,‚Äù commented a social media user.

This playful participation highlights the blend of culture and festivity within Google, echoing Pichai's personal connections to cricket and his heritage.

item.title: 1:5 Stock Split: 3500% up in 5 years! Multibagger share fixes RECORD DATE - ET Now
item.description:
1:5 Stock Split: 3500% up in 5 years! Multibagger share fixes RECORD DATE

Updated Dec 25, 2024 from ET NOW News

The stock of Jai Balaji Industries has shown remarkable growth, yielding a 3500% return in the last five years. The company has announced a 1:5 stock split aimed at enhancing liquidity and attracting retail investors.

  • The stock has delivered 3,500% returns over the past five years.
  • This stock split will be the first by the company.
  • The company's board has approved the stock split in the ratio 1:5.
"...to enhance the liquidity of the company's equity shares and to encourage participation of retail investors by making equity shares of the company more affordable."

The record date for the stock split is set for January 17, 2025, determining the shareholders eligible for the split.

item.title: Stock market holiday: NSE, BSE shut today for trading on account of Christmas 2024 | Stock Market News - Mint
item.description:
Stock Market Holiday: NSE and BSE Closed for Christmas 2024

Publication Date: December 25, 2024 - Source: Live Mint

The Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) and the National Stock Exchange (NSE) will be closed today for trading due to Christmas. This marks the last stock market holiday of the year.

On December 25, 2024, no trading or settlement activities will occur in various stock segments, including derivatives and securities lending. Additionally, major global markets in the UK, US, and Europe will also be closed.

  • No trading in stocks, derivatives, or SLB on December 25.
  • Currency and commodity markets will be closed for the entire day.
  • Trading will resume on December 26, 2024.
  • The next holiday is Mahashivratri on February 26, 2025.
The last stock market holiday of the year is on Christmas, allowing for a break in trading activities.

This holiday is significant as it affects trading schedules and investor activities during the festive season.

item.title: Stock market holiday: Are BSE, NSE open or closed today for Christmas 2024? - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Stock Market Holiday: BSE and NSE Closed for Christmas 2024

Publication Date: December 25, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

India's stock exchanges‚Äîthe BSE and the NSE‚Äîare closed on December 25 for trading due to Christmas festivities, aligning with other global markets observing the holiday.

  • The BSE and NSE will also close their segments for commodity derivatives, currency derivatives, and electronic gold receipts.
  • This is the last trading holiday of 2024, with the exchanges observing a total of 16 holidays this year.
  • On December 24, the stock markets closed slightly in the red after a volatile session.
  • Nifty 50 and Sensex faced pressure due to high dollar strength and rising bond yields in the US, leading to sales by foreign institutional investors (FIIs).

Notable Statistics

‚ÄúNifty 50 ended at 23,727.65, declining 25.80 points, or 0.11%.‚Äù
‚ÄúSensex closed at 78,472.87, down 67.30 points, or 0.09%.‚Äù

Investors are currently prioritizing safety over returns in this economically turbulent context.

item.title: Oil prices up by 1% in thin pre-holiday trade | Stock Market News - Mint
item.description:
Oil Prices Increase by 1% in Thin Pre-Holiday Trade

Date & Source: December 24, 2023, Reuters

Oil prices rose by over 1% on Tuesday due to a better short-term outlook amid thin trading leading up to the Christmas and Hanukkah holidays.

  • Brent crude futures settled at $73.58, increasing by 1.3%.
  • U.S. West Texas Intermediate crude futures ended at $70.10, up by 1.2%.
  • FGE analysts predict price fluctuations as market activity decreases during this season.
  • There are indications of increased oil demand in the upcoming months.
  • China plans to issue 3 trillion yuan in special treasury bonds to stimulate their economy.
  • The U.S. economic data is mixed, indicating solid footing despite weaker consumer confidence.
‚ÄúGiven how short the paper market is on positioning, any supply disruption could lead to upward spikes in structure,‚Äù FGE analysts noted.

In conclusion, with impending holiday trading and supportive economic measures from China, oil prices are expected to see fluctuations but retain some upward momentum.

item.title: Telcos call Trai's plan to split data, voice packs as 'regressive' - The Economic Times
item.description:
Telcos Protest Trai's Voice and SMS-Only Tariff Packs as Regressive

Publication Date: Recent | Source: The Economic Times

India's leading telecom companies have criticized the Telecom Regulatory Authority of India's (Trai) new regulation mandating separate tariff packs for voice and SMS, arguing it will hinder technological progress and negatively affect 2G users.

  • Trai's mandate requires telecom operators to introduce special tariff vouchers for voice and SMS-only.
  • Telcos claim this regulation undermines the current trend of offering voice services for free within data bundles.
  • This move could restrict access to essential online services for 150 million 2G users.
  • The regulation comes at a time when major companies like Reliance Jio and Bharti Airtel are expanding their 4G and 5G networks.
‚ÄúTrai's current regulation seems to suggest it is not keen on these remaining 2G users experiencing the benefits of the data-centric Digital India initiatives,‚Äù said a senior telco executive.

In conclusion, telecom companies argue that Trai's new plan could reverse progress towards digitization and keep many users from accessing vital digital services.

item.title: Upcoming IPO: WestBridge Capital-backed IndiQube Spaces files DRHP with SEBI to raise ‚Çπ850 crore via IPO | Stock Market News - Mint
item.description:
Upcoming IPO: WestBridge Capital-backed IndiQube Spaces files DRHP with SEBI to raise ‚Çπ850 crore via IPO

Date: December 24, 2024

Source: Live Mint

IndiQube Spaces Ltd, a workplace solutions company, has filed preliminary draft papers with SEBI to raise ‚Çπ850 crore via an initial public offering (IPO).

IndiQube Spaces IPO Details

The IPO comprises a fresh issue of equity shares worth ‚Çπ750 crore and an offer for sale of ‚Çπ100 crore from promoters.

Utilization of Proceeds

  • Capital expenditures for establishing new centres: ‚Çπ462.6 crore
  • Repayment of borrowings: ‚Çπ100 crore
  • General corporate purposes

Company Overview

IndiQube, founded in 2015, manages 103 centres across 13 cities with a total area of 7.76 million square feet.

Its client base includes companies like Myntra, upGrad, and Siemens.

Financial Performance

The company reported a total income of ‚Çπ867.6 crore in fiscal 2024, up from ‚Çπ601.2 crore in fiscal 2023.

Board Expansion

Recently, IndiQube added four independent directors to its board, enhancing its governance and strategic direction.

item.title: Senores Pharmaceuticals IPO Allotment Date and Time; GMP is Rs 240! Shares finalisation status online - ET Now
item.description:
Senores Pharmaceuticals IPO Allotment Date and Time; GMP is Rs 240!

Updated: December 24, 2024 22:24 IST

Senores Pharmaceuticals Ltd's IPO saw strong investor participation, receiving 93.69 times subscription on its final day.

  • The IPO, valued at Rs 582 crore, had bids for 79,95,96,646 shares against an offering of 85,34,681 shares.
  • Non-institutional investors subscribed 96.30 times, and qualified institutional buyers (QIBs) subscribed 94.66 times.
  • The retail individual investors (RIIs) category saw a subscription of 90.46 times.

Senores Pharmaceuticals IPO Allotment Date

The allotment is expected to be finalized on Thursday, December 26, 2024.

How to Verify Allotment Status

To verify the allotment status, follow the steps outlined for both BSE and the registrar's website.

Listing Date

Senores Pharmaceuticals IPO will list on BSE and NSE with a tentative date of December 30, 2024.

GMP

Current GMP for Senores Pharmaceuticals IPO is Rs 240 with an anticipated gain of 61.38% per share.

Company Profile

Senores Pharmaceuticals focuses on developing and manufacturing specialized pharmaceutical products, including antibiotics and anti-fungal medications.

(Disclaimer: The above article is meant for informational purposes only, and should not be considered as any investment advice.)

item.title: Number of non-farm firms grew 13% to 7.3 crore: Govt survey | Company Business News - Mint
item.description:
India's Non-Farm Firms Surge by 13% to 7.3 Crore: Government Survey

Publication Date: New Delhi, October 2023

The number of non-farm firms in India has grown to 7.34 crore, reflecting robust recovery and growth in the unincorporated non-agricultural sector post-pandemic.

  • 12.84% increase in non-farm firms reported for the period October 2023 to September 2024.
  • Manufacturing accounted for over 20% of the gross value added, with trade at one-third and services at 44%.
  • Employment in these enterprises rose to 12 crore, nearly 10% higher than the previous year.
  • Women-owned establishments increased from 23% to 26.2% compared to the previous year.
  • The average wage per worker saw a 13% growth, with manufacturing leading at over 16% increase.
‚ÄúThis wage growth serves as a catalyst, strengthening the labour market, enhancing productivity, and fuelling broader economic demand.‚Äù - Ministry of Statistics

The substantial growth in non-farm enterprises indicates a positive trend in India's economic recovery, empowerment of women in entrepreneurship, and improvement in employment conditions.

item.title: No, MicroStrategy Not Selling 10 Billion Shares to Buy Bitcoin - U.Today
item.description:
MicroStrategy Not Selling 10 Billion Shares to Buy Bitcoin

Publication Date: December 24, 2024 | Source: U.Today

Amid speculations, MicroStrategy is not issuing 10 billion shares to purchase $3 trillion worth of Bitcoin, as clarified by analyst Jeff Park.

  • Rumors suggested MicroStrategy would issue shares to buy an extravagant amount of Bitcoin.
  • Jeff Park called the speculation unrealistic, emphasizing that Bitcoin's total market cap is under $2 trillion.
  • MicroStrategy's share value is closely tied to Bitcoin, but a collapse in Bitcoin won't lead to MSTR's complete failure.
  • Park reassured investors not to panic sell when Bitcoin prices fluctuate.
"$MSTR is not issuing 10 billion shares to buy $3 trillion worth of Bitcoin. I can‚Äôt believe I‚Äôm tweeting this on Christmas Eve." ‚Äî Jeff Park

Park highlighted MicroStrategy's robust financial strategies, echoing sentiments from experts who see MSTR shares as undervalued.

item.title: Another boost after bumper IPO, listing gains! International Gemmological Institute - Mega Rs 1347.17 cr acquisition - ET Now
item.description:
International Gemmological Institute Acquires Two Companies for Rs 1347.17 Crore

Updated December 24, 2024 | Source: ET Now

The International Gemmological Institute has acquired a 100% stake in IGI Netherlands B.V. and International Gemmological Institute BV for approximately Rs 1347.17 crore, following a successful IPO listing.

  • Acquisition includes IGI Netherlands B.V. and International Gemmological Institute BV as wholly owned subsidiaries.
  • IGI Netherlands B.V. operates in Dubai, Israel, Thailand, Hong Kong, China, and Egypt.
  • International Gemmological Institute BV was established in 1975 and operates in Belgium and the USA.
‚Äú...we would like to inform you that the Company has acquired 100% stake in IGI Netherlands B.V. and International Gemmological Institute BV...‚Äù

This acquisition marks a significant expansion for International Gemmological Institute, solidifying its global presence in the certification and accreditation services market for diamonds and gemstones.
